alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Dallas; Guthrie; Polk; Sac (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 25 at 1:29PM CST until January 26 at 9:00AM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Bitter Cold Continues Through Wednesday... .Cold temperatures and bitter wind chill values will continue into Wednesday. Bitter wind chills will spread from north to south as the evening progresses, and will continue to do this overnight into Wednesday morning. While winds overnight will be light, the air temperatures will drop well below zero degrees, augmenting wind chill values further downward with any gentle breeze. The coldest values will be in northern and northeastern Iowa overnight. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...West and west-central Iowa. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
